analysis.description:
OysterPearl (/unique_chucks/28/0xa3d48af5b7541658e7b663905f11433f1b4074f5.sol#5-232) has incorrect ERC20 function interface(s):
	-transfer (/unique_chucks/28/0xa3d48af5b7541658e7b663905f11433f1b4074f5.sol#152-156)

OysterPearl.claim (/unique_chucks/28/0xa3d48af5b7541658e7b663905f11433f1b4074f5.sol#92-104) uses a dangerous strict equality:
	- require(bool)(claimed[msg.sender] == 1 || (block.timestamp - claimed[msg.sender]) >= 60)

OysterPearl.claim (/unique_chucks/28/0xa3d48af5b7541658e7b663905f11433f1b4074f5.sol#92-104) uses timestamp for comparisons
	Dangerous comparisons:
	- require(bool)(claimed[msg.sender] == 1 || (block.timestamp - claimed[msg.sender]) >= 60) (/unique_chucks/28/0xa3d48af5b7541658e7b663905f11433f1b4074f5.sol#94-95)

OysterPearl.decimals should be constant (/unique_chucks/28/0xa3d48af5b7541658e7b663905f11433f1b4074f5.sol#9-10)
OysterPearl.name should be constant (/unique_chucks/28/0xa3d48af5b7541658e7b663905f11433f1b4074f5.sol#7-8)
OysterPearl.symbol should be constant (/unique_chucks/28/0xa3d48af5b7541658e7b663905f11433f1b4074f5.sol#8-9)
tokenRecipient.receiveApproval (/unique_chucks/28/0xa3d48af5b7541658e7b663905f11433f1b4074f5.sol#3) should be declared external
OysterPearl.transferOwnership (/unique_chucks/28/0xa3d48af5b7541658e7b663905f11433f1b4074f5.sol#60-65) should be declared external
OysterPearl.selfLock (/unique_chucks/28/0xa3d48af5b7541658e7b663905f11433f1b4074f5.sol#65-68) should be declared external
OysterPearl.amendAmount (/unique_chucks/28/0xa3d48af5b7541658e7b663905f11433f1b4074f5.sol#68-76) should be declared external

OysterPearl.openSale (/unique_chucks/28/0xa3d48af5b7541658e7b663905f11433f1b4074f5.sol#83-84) should be declared external

OysterPearl.approveAndCall (/unique_chucks/28/0xa3d48af5b7541658e7b663905f11433f1b4074f5.sol#194-207) should be declared external

Detected issues with version pragma in /unique_chucks/28/0xa3d48af5b7541658e7b663905f11433f1b4074f5.sol:
